# OpenWorker

![Azure DevOps builds (branch)](https://img.shields.io/azure-devops/build/sawich0134/2f65619c-22bc-4c28-8f48-501672a5cf96/1/main?style=for-the-badge)
![CodeFactor Grade](https://img.shields.io/codefactor/grade/github/sawich/openworker?style=for-the-badge)
![Lines of code](https://img.shields.io/tokei/lines/github/sawich/openworker?style=for-the-badge)
![MatWorker](https://img.shields.io/badge/Mat-Worker-lightgrey?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/webp;base64,)
![Discord](https://img.shields.io/discord/606442027873206292?style=for-the-badge)
![Twitch Status](https://img.shields.io/twitch/status/sawich?style=for-the-badge)

Just another server emulator for korean SoulWoker written in .NET 5.

### Chat üôã

[Discord channel](http://discord.gg/SequFJP)

## How to ‚ùî

### Configuration

#### Project: SoulCore

- rename **config/commonsettings.example.json** to **config/commonsettings.json**
- rename **config/commonsettings.Development.example.json** to **config/commonsettings.Development.json**

```jsonc
  "Game": {
    // setup game directory
    // currently server use only data12.v and data49.v files
    // at end, directory path looks like: `YOUR_ENTERED_PATH/datas/data12|49.v`
    "Dir": "",
    "Datas": {
      // setup passwords for archives here
      "Passwords": {
        "Data12": "",
        "Data41": "",
        "Data49": ""
      }
    }
  }
```

#### Project: ow.Service.District

rename **config/appsettings.example.json** to **config/appsettings.json**

```jsonc
{
  // commonsettings["World"]["Instance"]["World-01"]
  "World": "World-01",

  // commonsettings["World"]["Instance"]["World-01"]["District"]["Rocco-01"]
  "District": "Rocco-01"
}
```

#### Project: ow.Service.World

rename **config/appsettings.example.json** to **config/appsettings.json**

```jsonc
{
  // commonsettings["World"]["Instance"]["World-01"]
  "World": "World-01",
}
```


### Database

- Uses **PostgreSQL** for storage.

Apply migration with nuget console: `update-database -Context MigrationContext -Project SetupDatabase`

### Run

Just build solution and launch output files.

## What's implemented? üí´

##### üíæ Auth Service

- [x] Login
- [x] Gate list
- [x] Gate join request

##### üê§ Gate Service

- [x] Join
- [x] Change background _(without save)_
- [x] Character

  - [x] Create _(without default clothes)_
  - [x] Delete _(without save)_
  - [x] Change slot _(without save)_
  - [x] Mark as favorite _(without save)_

- [x] District join request
- [ ] Prologue join request

##### üëØ District Service

- [x] Join
- [ ] Maze enter
- [ ] Party / PartyEx _(Soul squad)_
  - [ ] Join
  - [ ] Leave
  - [ ] Kick
  - [ ] Pass master
  - [ ] Maze enter
 - [ ] Syncronization
   - [x] Movement
   - [ ] Jump
   - [x] Stop
 - [x] Gesture _(without costume validation)_

##### üêÇ Maze Service

- [ ] Hello, world
